DOC.detailed_description: The objective study assess safety effectiveness two weekly peri-osteotendinous injection OVT relief pain patient lateral epicondylosis multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo control superiority study . A total 186 subject enrol 20 center US Europe . The randomization ratio 2:1 ( 2 OVT subject : 1 placebo subject ) . The entire study duration first subject last subject approximately one year . The enrollment phase approximately 6 month follow-up phase 6 month . Visits schedule baseline , 1 week , 4 week , 12 week , 18 week , 26 week . Study injection give baseline 1 week visit .
